name: Raising The Heroine Right
description:
You are someone who live their life normally and so what you thought, as everything changed when you get involved in an accident that changed your normal and boring life into something you didn't expect in your whole life... FEATURES: 
  •  You can change the PC's name, physical appearance, and personality.  The gender is set to girl (I know it sucks but since I only knew the basic of the basic in using Twine, I can't do anything about it.. Sorry :P) 
  •  Raise the Heroine into an evil and meticulous villainess, a lovely and innocent heroine, or something balanced. The heroine's behavior will be based on how you raised her! ( think of her as your daughter ) 
  • Ofcourse, finding love is an option.. You don't want to raise her alone do you? or not?..  We will discuss it later.. ;) 
  • Uncover your new body and the heroine's origin.. Cause there are secrets that needs to unfold in every fantasy world.........  Right?.  (Well in my case, I'm a lore bitch so that's that.. ) 
LOVE INTEREST: 

The pc can have  3 boy love interests and ??? ( the secret one ps: Ofcourse the heroine will not be made by only one parent right?.. I mean even if this is a fantasy world, you can't... Not in this story.. ) You can choose to have either platonic relationship  or Romance one of them. Chasing other love interest while on the other route will broke their hearts.. (You evil sick bastard.. :( ) 

LEONARD ALTAZAR -  He is the crown prince of Altazar kingdom ( A/n: the altazar misses the letter B jk! :P )  and is known for their playful character. He is known as a flatterer and all smiles but all of it is just a facade and lies he fabricated to protect himself. Can you uncover that facade and let him show you his true character?. 

HARRIS SOLNER- He is a duke who is innocent about.... Everything.. He is so carefree that even his servants worry about him too much. ( A/n: He is my cute cinnamon roll ;P ) Romace with him can be..... Frustrating because he is innocent.. Too much innocent. BUT as you progress with his route, He can be sweet and very charming as he get closer to you..  

ZARZIEL ERVIAN- He is an archmage who is colder than the ice ( A/n: Elsa? Do you want to build a snowman?. No? oki fine. :(  ) itself.  He doesn't care about  anyone and treats them like dirt. For him, he is the supperior and all of you are ants. (A/n: damn! it really  hurts.. Ang magmahal ng ganito char! ) But behind all of that harsh attitude is a boy who experience a lot of trauma. Can you heal his wounds and change him? or Add more to his trauma? (A/n: please don't hurt him anymore~) 

???- (A/n: This one is.. Let's just say the mysterious parent who abandons their responsibility.  Yes!.. That's a very good one.. ) Apparently, He is your other half/partner/couple. But the reason he is gone is to protect you and the heroine from an even greater danger.. Can you accept this (A/n: Cockroach) whoever he is in your life again?.  And what greater danger does he want you and the heroine to be protected from? 

OTHER CHARACTERS: 

AMAURA ALTAZAR- She is the princess of Altazar Kingdom ( A/n: Where is my good 'ole B? -altazar ) and the younger sister of prince Leonard. But unlike her older brother, Amaura is very meticulous and elegant. Nobles and commoners deem her as a rightful queen better than the crown prince (prince Leonard) but she likes her brother more and seems to support her brother's reign.  Do you want to be the friend of a perfect queen or become her most hated enemy instead? 

SELENA- She is a commoner. Someone who has no power and is nothing to nobles BUT selena seems to know much more than what the ordinary commoner know is. She doesn't let down her guard around anyone and chooses what she would say aroud people. Can you uncover her secret? and why does she seems protectful and respectful of you and the heroine?. Does she even know about you two?.

CRYSTALIA-  She is a guildmaster who have a heroic and badass character . (A/n: when I say badass, It is the opposite trust me.. You don't?.. Fine I hate you.. :( ) She likes kids very much and the kids adore her execpt yours. The heroine hates her (A/n: Why?.. Don't ask me.. Ask the heroine my god.. )  Learn the truth about her and became her friend or her worst enemy..
